/* file : BoardMapper.xml, id : getBoardList2 */ SELECT A.* , DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DT , U.USERNAME AS REG_USERNAME
, C.CODE_NAME AS CATEGORY_NAME , C.REF_CLASS AS CATEGORY_CLASS
, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ST_FILES F WHERE F.DEL_FLAG = 0 AND F.REF_TYPE = #{board_type} AND F.REF_SEQ = A.BOARD_SEQ ) AS FILE_CNT
FROM ST_BOARD A INNER JOIN ST_USER U ON A.REG_USER_SEQ = U.USER_SEQ
INNER JOIN ST_CODE_DTL C ON C.GRP_CODE = 'FAQ_TYPE' AND C.CODE = A.CATEGORY
WHERE A.DEL_FLAG = 0
AND A.CATEGORY = #{category}
AND A.SUBJECT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY A.BOARD_SEQ DESC /*||ORDER BY BOARD_SEQ DESC||*/
/* file : BoardMapper.xml, id : getBoardSettingList */ SELECT * FROM ST_BOARD_SETTING WHERE DEL_FLAG = 0 ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC
